CmdLine: apk add curl &&     curl -sLO https://github.com/github/git-lfs/releases/download/v$GIT_LFS_VERSION/git-lfs-linux-amd64-$GIT_LFS_VERSION.tar.gz &&     sha256sum git-lfs-linux-amd64-$GIT_LFS_VERSION.tar.gz | grep $GIT_LFS_SHA256 &&     tar zxvf git-lfs-linux-amd64-$GIT_LFS_VERSION.tar.gz &&     mv git-lfs-$GIT_LFS_VERSION/git-lfs /usr/bin/ &&     rm -rf git-lfs-$GIT_LFS_VERSION &&     rm -rf git-lfs-linux-amd64-$GIT_LFS_VERSION.tar.gz &&     apk del curl
Commands.Name: run
